About

Hi there, this is Yassine! I'm currently a 2nd year PhD student, working at the intersection of CV and NLP for multi-modal document analysis and understanding @ CentraleSup√®lec.

My goal with this blog is to share ML related things that I've learned & find intersting, that it is, in the clearest and most straightforward way without losing any substance. And testing my understanding of the subjects, to see if I really know something, or only its name.

If you have any questions or find any errors, please feel free to send me an email: ouali DOT yasine AT gmail.com. Thanks :).

I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something.

Richard Feynman
